text: Ojo nadidaī, ej Rasul, ki haroina, Alloh az osmon ʙoron firistod va onro dar zamin darovard, pas onro cun caşmasorhoe dar zamin ravon gardonid, on goh ʙa on kiştzorhoi rangorang ʙirūjonid, sipas hama xuşk meşavand va meʙinī, ki zard (xazon) şudaand, sipas onro reza-reza megardonad? Begumon dar in kori Alloh pande ʙaroi xiradmandon ast
